website_summaries.verdict: The Motorola Moto E combines high-quality parts with clean Android software to great effect. It earns an Editors' Choice for budget-friendly smartphones on Boost Mobile.

customer_reviews.title: Bargain phone
customer_reviews.text: Never been a phone person but wouldn't be without it now, what a bargain it was! Use hello Google all the time. Highly recommend, get one you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: mickypops66

customer_reviews.title: Good Value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son great little phone smooth in operation good screen and with the advantage of being made by established name and if lost or broken will not cost a fortune to replace
customer_reviews.author: Bimbsi59

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Runs out of memory really quickly - have replaced it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tharagonnet

customer_reviews.title: e good on off button and power connections the things that ...
customer_reviews.text: This little phone so far has exceeded my expectations. well built i.e good on off button and power connections the things that normally go on most cheap phones. Works quickly really easy to set up screen good . Worth a punt.
customer_reviews.author: Chubby

customer_reviews.title: An excellent budget Android phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the mother in law, she loved it, so did the father in law, so he wanted me to buy him one as well. I'm not being asked how to do things on it, so that proves its very easy to use. An excellent budget Android phone
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone. First time I've had a touchphone so little bits to learn but I've picked it up as I've gone along. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I have bought. Trouble free. No hesitation in recommending.
customer_reviews.author: BILLY BOOTS

customer_reviews.title: Network locked phone
customer_reviews.text: Phone was network locked, didn't work with any SIM we had, had to buy unlock code in Ebay to unlock it. Funny thing is that several months ago I bought exactly same phone here and it was fine, so I guess its a mixed bag with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son starting secondary school. An incredible phone for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very slow phone
customer_reviews.text: very very slow. no storage and now buying a new phone after 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: G.pollock

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought for my 8 years old son. works well so far. arrived quickly
customer_reviews.author: Anna Lobanova

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone. But wont play Pokemon Go.
customer_reviews.text: Had to send back as won't play Pokemon Go. Get the Moto G instead.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Rooney

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is okay for the first couple of months..now is very slow and the screen keeps freezing. Bit dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Budget phone at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I compared this Against the Samsung ace 4,And this one felt more solid.
customer_reviews.author: MR T
